main event: A bright white object, the size of a first magnitude star, was observed flying from West to East at a very high altitude.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 4 minutes,The object decreased in altitude from 25 degrees to 15 degrees during the sighting,The sighting occurred on 29 April 1964,The sighting has characteristics typical of a satellite,The documentation is part of Project Blue Book, an Air Force record for UFO sightings.
